# cmccloudv2 Provider





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `api_key` (String) API key get from account settings in https://portalv2.cloud.cmctelecom.vn
- `project_id` (String) Id of project
- `region_id` (String) Name of region, eg hn-1,hcm-1

### Optional

- `api_endpoint` (String) The URL use for the CMC Cloud API
